title: Bluehour
description: Beautiful, Mysterious, Dangerous...A clique of gorgeous teenagers with curious ways transfer to Grace's high school. They eat raw meat and surf under the stars. After Grace suspects one of the boys has inexplicable powers, she sets out to unravel his mysteries. During the process, they fall madly in love. But this romance has put Grace's life in utter danger.This is book 1 of the Watermagic Novels.Bluedawn (Watermagic Series, #2)and Bluewicked (Watermagic Series, #3) is available now!
author: Brighton Hill
